amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase EPA's Environmental Programs and Management account by $1.9 million (offset by a similar reduction from the Office of the Secretary) in order to restore brownfields funding to FY 2015 levels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Office of the Secretary Departmental Operations by 1,913,000 and increase the funding for the Environmental Programs and Management by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 239 (Roll no. 396).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 239 (Roll no. 396).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Ms. Castor (FL).
